{"id":1824638902,"question_id":4119,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1762656355,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"662 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1824638902/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Distance Between Three Equal Elements II","memory":"404.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumDistance(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        unordered_map<int, set<int>> m;\n\n\n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if ((int)m[nums[i]].size() >= 2) {\n                int a = *m[nums[i]].rbegin();\n                int b = *next(m[nums[i]].rbegin(), 1);\n                ans = min(ans, 2*(i - b));\n            }\n            m[nums[i]].insert(i);\n        }\n\n        return (ans == INT_MAX ? -1 : ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-distance-between-three-equal-elements-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1349}
